ca.concordia.lanternsentities.ai

Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.lanternsentities.ai.AI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GreedyAI, HumanPlayer, RandomAI, UnfriendlyAI, UnpredictableAI

    public class AI
extends java.lang.Object
    AI class allows each player to have the choice of 4 specific behaviors if they are a computer player, or to be controlled by a human player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AI() 
      AI(AIType type, Game game, Player currentPlayer) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Game getGame() 
      Player getPlayer() 
      AIType getType() 
      void performDedication()
      Each player must have the choice to perform a dedication when the appropriate number of lantern cards is in their inventory.
      void performExchange()
      Each player must have the choice to perform a lantern card exchange when the appropriate number of favor tokens is in their inventory.
      void performTilePlay()
      Each player must perform a lake tile play every turn.
      void setDedicationBehavior(DedicationBehavior dedicationMood) 
      void setExchangeBehavior(ExchangeBehavior exchangeMood) 
      void setGame(Game game) 
      void setPlayer(Player player)
